parameters.name: AllocationType
parameters.description:
The allocation type. Valid values:

*   Normal: queries all reserved instances that belong to the current account.
*   Shared: queries reserved instances that are shared between the main account and linked accounts.

Default value: Normal.

parameters.name: InstanceType
parameters.description: The instance type. For more information, see [Instance families](~~25378~~).

parameters.name: InstanceTypeFamily
parameters.description: The instance family. For more information, see [Instance families](~~25378~~).

parameters.name: LockReason
parameters.description:
The reason why the instance is locked. Valid values:

*   financial: You have an overdue payment in your account, or the reserved instance has expired.
*   security: The reserved instance is locked for security reasons.

parameters.name: OfferingType
parameters.description:
The payment option of the reserved instances. Valid values:

*   No Upfront
*   Partial Upfront
*   All Upfront

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number. Pages start from page 1.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Maximum value: 100.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instances. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ReservedInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of reserved instance N. Valid values of N: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: ReservedInstanceName
parameters.description: The name of the reserved instance.

parameters.name: Scope
parameters.description:
The scope of the reserved instances. Valid values:

*   Region
*   Zone

Default value: Region.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of reserved instance N. Valid values of N: 1 to 100. Valid values:

*   Creating
*   Active
*   Expired
*   Updating

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags to add to the instances.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description: The zone ID of the reserved instances. This parameter is required when Scope is set to Zone. You can call the [DescribeZones](~~25610~~) operation to query the most recent zone list.
